section.title: File
section.programlisting: f = open('/tmp/workfile', 'r+') f.write('0123456789abcdef') f.seek(5) # Go to the 6th byte in the file f.read(1) f.seek(-3, 2) # Go to the 3rd byte before the end f.read(1) f.readline() f.close()
with open('beak', 'rb+') as f: content = f.read() f.seek(0) f.write(content.replace(b'\r', b'')) f.truncate()
